query: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name LIKE '%portal%' OR table_name LIKE '%token%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name LIKE '%portal%' OR table_name LIKE '%token%';
